testcase.classname: New User Order with Bank Transfer on Android
testcase.name: New User Order with Bank Transfer Test on Android
testcase.system-out: Given Android on the main screen............................................passed When Android clicks a physical product......................................passed And Android clicks "Sepete Ekle" with textview..............................passed And Android clicks "Giriş Yap / Üye Ol" button..............................passed And Android clicks Üye Ol button............................................passed And Android fills in the information in the form with valid values..........passed And Android clicks Sepetim button...........................................passed And Android clicks "Satın Al" with textview.................................passed And Android clicks "Adres Ekle" with textview...............................passed And The Android fills in the information on the address page................passed And Android clicks "PTT Kargo" with textview................................passed And Android clicks "Devam Et" with textview.................................passed And Android clicks BankTransfer Radio Button................................passed And Android clicks "Devam Et" with textview.................................passed And Android verifies total price............................................passed And Android clicks preInformation checkBox..................................passed And Android clicks "Siparişi Onaylayın" with textview.......................passed And Android verifies the order is created...................................passed
